title: HOUR 3 - Roughing the passer, NFL
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Roughing the passer, NFL
description:
UCLA HC Chip Kelly talks about what makes his offense the best in country right now

More on the NFL and their current roughing the passer rule

Thoughts on WR DaVante Adams' actions after the Raiders loss to the Chiefs

 

Guests: Chip Kelly, Mike Pereira

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
